title: Flask 1.0 backwards-incompat with double-slash/no-slash re. #2629
raw_output: Issue 2731 reports a backwards-incompatible change in Flask 1.0 regarding URL routing with double-slash or no-slash patterns. The fix involves modifying how blueprints and the app handle URL rule registration. Predicted files: (1) flask/blueprints.py - blueprint URL registration. (2) flask/app.py - app-level URL routing. (3) CHANGES.rst - changelog entry. (4) tests/test_blueprints.py - blueprint routing tests. Exploration: Both app.py and blueprints.py are involved in URL routing. Test file mapping: flask/blueprints.py -> tests/test_blueprints.py.
